oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Puente Gil, Irene
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper analyzes how Lane Clark's approach to developing thinking and learning can be used in an English as a Foreign Language Class to promote second language acquisition.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Universidad de Zaragoza; Departamento de Filología Inglesa y Alemana; Área de Filología Inglesa
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Graduado en Maestro Educación Primaria
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lane Clark and L2: Thinking, Learning and Teaching English in Spanish Primary Classrooms
